org.ngi.nodes.language

Class Children

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ngi.Element
      • org.ngi.Node
        • org.ngi.nodes.language.BaseParameters
          • org.ngi.nodes.language.Children
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Children
extends BaseParameters
    Node for children() reference. Supports simple children() reference or can take an optional Input to specify an index, range, or vector for children selection.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
